body: The mere sound of these words causes agony in those unfortunate enough to hear them.
name: Pain Words
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Magic/Rules/Words of Power/Effect Words/Pain Words

sections.body:
School necromancy

Level bard 0, cleric 0, inquisitor 0, sorcerer/wizard 0, witch 0

Duration 1 round

Saving Throw Fortitude negates

Spell Resistance yes

The targets of a wordspell with this effect word have their base speed reduced by half (minimum 10 feet).
sections.name: Cramp
sections.url: pfsrd://Ultimate Magic/Rules/Words of Power/Effect Words/Pain Words/Cramp

sections.body:
School necromancy

Level bard 1, cleric 1, inquisitor 1, sorcerer/wizard 1, witch 1

Duration 1 round/level

Saving Throw Fortitude negates

Spell Resistance yes

The targets of a wordspell with this effect word are sickened.
sections.name: Wrack
sections.url: pfsrd://Ultimate Magic/Rules/Words of Power/Effect Words/Pain Words/Wrack

sections.body:
School necromancy

Level bard 3, inquisitor 3, sorcerer/wizard 3, witch 3

Duration 1 round/level

Saving Throw Fortitude negates

Spell Resistance yes

The targets of a wordspell with this effect word are nauseated; they receive another save at the end of their turn to end this effect.
